projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:

Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

div.head: prathamaḥ parivarttaḥ

lg.l: varadāṃ ca mayā natvā kriyate jayamaṃgalam //
namo namo mayā samyag ucyate citralakṣaṇam //
viṣṇvindrau sūryamagniṃ ca varuṇaṃ marutaṃ tathā //
bhayajito manaḥ śuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tapasi drutam //
kathaṃ rodiṣi bho vipra cetyapṛcchad dvijaṃ nṛpaḥ //
viṣmayo ya itaḥ pūrvaṃ na jāto 'sau pravartate //
prāṇatulyaṃ sutaṃ mahyaṃ dehi svāmin kṛpānvitaḥ //
ākarṣaṇe sutaṃ tasya matiṃ cakre nṛpālakaḥ //
viśvakarman dvijanmane asmai prītyā ca dhīmate //
dadau pratyuttaraṃ mṛdu tejasā pūritaṃ vacaḥ //
tasmāt rājan vijānīyān mayā naiva pragṛhyate //
karmānusāriṇī bhūmir vijñeyā ca sadā nṛṇām //
dehi dehi sutaṃ deva rājñāpi prārthitaḥ punaḥ //
vyākulau tī mahāyuddhe tadā liptau babhūvatuḥ //
sthito 'smīti raṇe rājan tamavocad nṛpaṃ yamaḥ //
ājagāma svayaṃ tatra tasmin deśe raṇākule //
sāñjaliḥ pūjayitvā taṃ prāha yathāyathaṃ vacaḥ //
pratyāvṛtya raṇād devaḥ kathayāmāsa tau tadā //
labdhañca maraṇaṃ śīghra janma prāpya ca mānuṣam //
yamadutā jitāḥ śaktyā sādhu sādhu kṛtaṃ tvayā //
brahmā svayaṃ samāśvāsya bhūpatiṃ prāha sattamaḥ //
nālpamapi sukhaṃ kiñcid āpnoti nindukaḥ sadā //
jātyā balena dānena naipuṇyena ca vidyayā //
pratyakṣaṃ prāpyate yattu sārthakyaṃ tasya cintayet //
vidhiyaṃ naiva kāryaṃ hi yamasyāpi tato nṛpa //
yamadāsaiḥ sadā viśvaṃ na pātayed bhavān khalu //
adya prabhṛti taccitra jagadvandyaṃ bhavet sadā //
sarve nemuśca bhaktyā taṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokapālakam //
yasmād deśāt samāpannas tatraiva praviveśa ca //
tat praṣṭuṃ sṛṣṭikattariṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma saḥ //
citrasya lakṣaṇāni me nānāvidhāni santi ca //
atiguhyaṃ mahad vākyaṃ paramaṃ kathayāmi te //
tataḥ prajā mayā sṛṣṭā upadiṣṭāśca tā mayā //
vedāccitraṃ prajātaṃ vai tasmād jñeyaṃ tathaiva tat //
yathā nareṣu bhūpendras tathā citraṃ kalāsu vai //
tathā śreṣṭhaṃ bhaveccitraṃ sarvāsu hi kalāsu ca //
citrasya lakṣaṇaṃ karma upadiśatu me prabho //
citraśilpasya śāstraṃ tu tasmai rājñe hyupādiśat //
brahmaṇaḥ kṛpayā labdhāḥ sarve śilpā mayā kṛtāḥ //
likhitvā vividhaṃ samyak tubhyaṃ mayā pradaśryate //

div.trailer: || iti nagnajiccitralakṣaṇanirdeśe nagnajayo nāma prathamaḥ parivarttaḥ ||

lg.l: prādurabhūt suvarṇāṇḍaṃ tamo hatvā jalāt kila //
evaṃ kṛte sati brahmācintayat jagato hitam //
apramādena cādaraḥ sadā teṣu kathaṃ bhavet //
nātra śaṅkā kṛthā naraḥ pūjayiṣyati vaḥ sadā //
sarveṣā rakṣaṇa kṛtvā pāpān nāśayati dhruvam //
tayaiva dīyate śāntis tasmai bhaktāya sarvataḥ //
tat tathaiva pravakṣyāmi mānaṃ brūhi prajāsu ca //
aṣṭalikṣā bhaved yūkaḥ aṣṭayūkā yavaḥ smṛtaḥ //
sākṣāt savarṇyate cātra purvoktaṃ vistareṇa ca //
dvātriṃśat tasya maṇdalam aṅgulīnāṃ hi mānataḥ //
narttane rodane krodhe cāpākārā bhavet sadā //
dvyaṅgulau hyakṣikoṣaḥ syān netramadhyaṃ tathaiva tu //
krodhayuk roṣayuk caiva na mukhaṃ syāt kadācana //
susampanno bhaviṣyati nara iha ca sarvadā //
tad vijñeyaṃ ca devānāṃ mukhasya mānamīdṛśam //
daighrye tvaṣṭāṅgulo jñeyo vakṣastu dviguṇaṃ smṛtam //
nābhito meṭraparyantaṃ samānaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam //
mānaṃ ca dahiṇāvarttaṃ yavaikaṃ cucukaṃ smṛtam //
mṛdu karikarākāraṃ na kāryaṃ viṣamaṃ kvacit //
itthaṃ caraṇamānaṃ syān mayā proktaṃ sucintitam //
aṅguṣṭhe dve tu parvaṇī samenaika yavo bhavet //
sukhadaṃ cāru susparśaṃ kuryāt karatalaṃ śubham //
sūkṣmā aṅgulijālā hi sundaraṃ ca tanustathā //
bāhūnāṃ mānamārohaṃ dhīman śṛṇu vadāni te //
yāni purvaṃ na coktāni tāni tubhyaṃ vadāmyaham //
āyāme cāṅgulīnāṃ hī saṃkhyā yāyād navānvitā //
caturaṅgulaṃ sthānaṃ syāt pāyustu dvyuṅgulaṃ matam //
varṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ caiva devamukhe na dīyate //
vakṣasthalaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca śobhitaṃ syāt sulakṣaṇam //
devabhūtamanuṣyāṇāṃ mukhe śmaśru na roma ca //
samantāt kiraṇāvṛtaḥ rājā lekhyaḥ kṛśaḥ sadā //
bhrūvoḥ kaṇṭhasya bhālasya saundaryaṃ hi mukhasya ca //
cārvoṣṭaṃ raktimāpūrṇaṃ svacchā dantā nabho yathā //
mukheṣu connatā jñeyā gulpho 'dṛśpo bhavet tathā //
suhastau caraṇau syātāṃ tathā parva ca dṛśyate //
śobhitau ca bhujau syātāṃ deho mānānvito bhavet //
tatra svāṅgulinā kāryaṃ mānaṃ sarvatra karmaṇi //
pratimā sā parityaktā suradevaiḥ sadā khalu //
śobhitān nāśayanti ca amaṅgalaṃ bhayaṃ bhavet //
brahmaṇā tu pradarśitaṃ vistaraṃ bravīmi te //
tubhyaṃ pradarśayāmi ced gacched grantho viśālatām //
āroho nāpriyo yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vidhīyatām //
nārīṇāṃ parimāṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ śṛṇu krameṇa hi //
